description:
This interactive direct-drive trainer makes it easy to study your cadence, power, and speed, while simulating real-road scenarios. Link to a desired training app from any device. With up to 15% gradient simulation and 2.5% accuracy, it's great if you're looking for versatility and precision without complicated setup. Use it at home or the office during the darkest days of winter, and come summer, it's compact enough to bring out for a pre-race warm-up in the parking lot.

  • Direct drive trainer ensures that every watt you generate is accounted for
  • Very quiet, noises you hear will be the chain and shifting gears
  • Pre-assembled, so setup is less than five minutes. Place your bike on the trainer and connect to a power source
  • Power reading accuracy of +/- 2.5% for precise training
  • Maximum brake power of 1900W at 40km/h or 2900W at 60km/h
  • Compact 3.5kg (7.7lb) flywheel is perfectly balanced for smooth, realistic, quiet ride
  • Electronically controlled magnetic trainer: predictable, consistent linear increase in resistance
  • Compatible with Shimano and SRAM 9, 10 and 11 speed cassettes sold separately
  • Sturdy, compact steel frame, legs automatically lock in place when unfolded
  • Freehub body available separately for Campagnolo, SRAM XD and XD-R and Shimano 12-speed Micro Spline
  • Suitable for 130 to 135mm hubs with 5mm diameter quick release axles and up to 142x12mm thru axle hubs
  • Adapters available separately for axles: 148x12mm (Boost), 135x10mm and 135x12mm
  • Realistic slope simulation of up to 15%
  • Works with previously installed ergometers
  • Sensorless technology gathers data without extras on your bike, keeping your bike clean
  • ANT+™, FE-C and Bluetooth™ control lets your app of choice change resistance
  • Compatible with: Zwift, TrainerRoad®, Kinomap®, Rouvy®, The Sufferfest®, Bikevo® and more
  • Includes a 30-day coupon for Zwift® and 12 month subscription to My E-Training from ELITE
  • Footprint: 56 x 76cm (22. x 29.92in.)
name: Elite Suito-T Bike Trainer
